snippet: Spain, Japan and Australia took 2-0 leads in their Davis Cup World Group playoffs on Friday, although Rafael Nadal was a late withdrawal from his scheduled opening singles match in New Delhi....
lead_paragraph: Spain, Japan and Australia took 2-0 leads in their Davis Cup World Group playoffs on Friday, although Rafael Nadal was a late withdrawal from his scheduled opening singles match in New Delhi.

headline.print_headline: Spain, Japan, Australia Up 2-0 in Davis Cup WGroup Playoffs
headline.main: Spain, Japan, Australia Up 2-0 in Davis Cup WGroup Playoffs
